title: next question
body:
```
python eval.py --dataset RobotCar --scene loop --model mapnet++ --weights logs/RobotCar_loop_mapnet++_mapnet++_RobotCar_learn_beta_learn_gamma_2seq/epoch_005.pth.tar --config_file configs/pgo_inference_RobotCar.ini --val --pose_graph

IOError: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '../data/deepslam_data/RobotCar/loop/test_split.txt'
```
where to download the file from? do I get it from http://robotcar-dataset.robots.ox.ac.uk/ ?
the text.split has been located at the current github repository, thank you.
Now it needs another file though:

I get the 1gb sample from oxford robotics, do I put it all just to /data/deepslam/RobotCar/ or I need to sort it out to different folders?
I copied the file manually to the error path but now it errors with vo.csv not presented.
Where to get normal structure of the folder 2014-06-23-15-41-25 ?
